Description

Represents the abstraction of creation and instantiation of tasks by client.

BooleanTask
Represents a simple task with no progression state.

Modify the selected property in the task with the given value.
ComplexTask
Represents a complex task with a progression state and sub-tasks.
DateEditingCell
Extension of the TreeTableCell with Task and LocalDate parameterized types Use a date picker to enable the user to select the date on a calendar (or manually with the date string)

Indicate if the selected property is disabled for the edition for the task taskPropertyName !

The controller of the home screen of the application.

Represents the priority level of a task

The implementation of the builder interface.

SubTaskDeletionVisitor
